title: Who knows this one?
content:
Anyone who knows this font?  
Thx

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040934/http:/typophile.com/files/font.PNG) | 13.87 KB |
author: Idiosyn

comments.content: This is [Rechtman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040934/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/rakowski/dr5/davy_f5.htm) by David Rakowski, a digitisation of Troubadour Light. You can find another (and better) take on the same design [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803040934/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/troubadour-pro/).
